content.question: The diagram shows two long, straight current-carrying wires that are oriented in the plane of the page. Each wire carries current of the same magnitude I. What is the magnitude and direction of the net magnetic field at location O?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator, mu sub 0, end sub, times i a, and denominator 2 pi, times b squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>I</mtext><mtext>a</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msup><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> toward the bottom of the page
